name: hotkey-ai-translator
title: HotKey AI Translator
description: A simple AI translation command that launches from Raycast's HotKey.
author: ogakuzuko

commands.name: get-selected-text
commands.title: AI Translate
commands.description: Translate the selected text using AI.

commands.name: ai-translate
commands.title: 【DO NOT USE DIRECTLY】Translate Result View
commands.description: Display the result of the AI translation. This command is intended to be called from the AI Translate command and should not be used directly.

preferences.name: openaiApiKey
preferences.title: OpenAI API Key
preferences.description: Your OpenAI API key for translation

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
